query: UPDATE calendar_events SET startTime = DATE_ADD(startTime, INTERVAL 5 HOUR), endTime = DATE_ADD(endTime, INTERVAL 5 HOUR), syncedAt = DATE_ADD(syncedAt, INTERVAL 5 HOUR); UPDATE meetings SET meetingDate = DATE_ADD(meetingDate, INTERVAL 5 HOUR), createdAt = DATE_ADD(createdAt, INTERVAL 5 HOUR), updatedAt = DATE_ADD(updatedAt, INTERVAL 5 HOUR); UPDATE tasks SET createdAt = DATE_ADD(createdAt, INTERVAL 5 HOUR), updatedAt = DATE_ADD(updatedAt, INTERVAL 5 HOUR);
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway04.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2U3q1dt8GKGPLLB.root --database WN9ut9YEufdDjevBezkAVQ --execute UPDATE calendar_events SET startTime = DATE_ADD(startTime, INTERVAL 5 HOUR), endTime = DATE_ADD(endTime, INTERVAL 5 HOUR), syncedAt = DATE_ADD(syncedAt, INTERVAL 5 HOUR); UPDATE meetings SET meetingDate = DATE_ADD(meetingDate, INTERVAL 5 HOUR), createdAt = DATE_ADD(createdAt, INTERVAL 5 HOUR), updatedAt = DATE_ADD(updatedAt, INTERVAL 5 HOUR); UPDATE tasks SET createdAt = DATE_ADD(createdAt, INTERVAL 5 HOUR), updatedAt = DATE_ADD(updatedAt, INTERVAL 5 HOUR);
